item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 4 Details Revealed
item.content:encoded:
Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 4 lands on December 16, 2025, introducing a new Elder Dragon, new equipment, features, events, and more.

Capcom had announced a Monster Hunter Showcase earlier this week, which was not only going to take us through the details of title update 4 for MH Wilds, but also new information on MH Stories 3: Twisted Reflection. The showcase was delayed to December 11 due to a tsunami warning in Japan, and is now available as a VOD.

Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update 4 Adds New Elder Dragon and Support Hunters

Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update 4 adds a new Elder Dragon called Gogmazios, who is available after completing the main mission ‚ÄúA First Cry.‚Äù It is a special quest that has four hunters bringing on support hunters (new feature) to form parties of 8 to take on this challenge, and you will be teaming up with Nadia and Fabius. Players will also find a permanent, replayable event quest version of the Gogmazios quest on the same day.

New Equipment

The new quest will also allow players to upgrade Rarity 8 Artian Weapons into Gogma Artian Weapons using materials obtained from Gogmazios. These weapons can have one bonus skill and one group skill chosen at random, and with Gogma Reinforce, players can retain their reinforcement bonuses or reset their skills completely. There‚Äôs new Armor Transcendence as well, allowing hunters to upgrade their HR 100+ armours even further.

New Arch-Tempered Monster, Support Hunters and Optional Quests

Title Update 4 for Monster Hunter Wilds will also introduce the Arch-tempered version of Jin Dahaad. Players will find new support hunters like Nadia, who uses a light bowgun, Griffin, who is a great sword wielder, and Nightmist, who uses a light bowgun as well. New high-difficulty quests have been added with several 9-star monsters, and there will be new limited-time quests that will let players forge special equipment, farm Heavy Armor Spheres, and more.

New Downloadable Content

Players will get access to four beloved poses from prior Monster Hunter games for free in the new update. They will also receive a free Character Edit and Palico Edit Vouchers. Lastly, a paid Cosmetic DLC Pack 4 is also coming.

Monster Hunter Wilds Performance Improvements Roadmap

The developers have acknowledged the ‚Äúgreat deal of feedback regarding improving the overall quality of the game‚Äù and have provided a roadmap for addressing these issues.

  • With Title Update 4 on December 16, the developers will work on CPU/GPU Optimization across all platforms, including improvements to processing, load reduction, and other optimizations.
  • Then, a Steam-exclusive CPU/GPU optimization patch will arrive in January 2026, adding new graphics and CPU settings, along with new presets and additional options to reduce processing load. It will improve the shader compilation process, VRAM usage, and high-resolution texture packs.
  • Another CPU/GPU optimization patch will be released for all platforms in February 2026, introducing level-of-detail (LOD) quality levels for polygonal meshes in 3D models, reducing GPU processing load.

Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update Roamap

The Free title update 4 will be released on December 16 with Gogmazios, Gogma Artisan Weapons, Advanced Optional Quests, Armor Transcendence, and other improvements and balancing updates instantly becoming available. Then, from December 19 to January 14, there will be a seasonal event, the Festival of Accord: Lumenhymn. Then the Arch-tempered Jin Dahaad will arrive on December 24.

Monster Hunter Wilds update version 1.041 will introduce Arch-tempered Arkveld, Advanced Quests, various improvements, a special collaboration with Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection, and a Design contest.

In other news, Monster Hunter Wilds was the best-selling game of 2025 earlier in the year. What are your thoughts on Monster Hunter Title Update 4? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the ARC Raider update fixing some out-of-bounds map exploits. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: ARC Raiders Update Fixes Some Out-of-Bounds Map Exploits
item.content:encoded:
Embark Studios has published a new update in ARC Raiders, one that addresses some of the most critical concerns players have about the game. In recent weeks, the patches pushed out by Embark Studios have been appreciated, but they‚Äôve been firefighting some pesky issues that have made some player experiences fairly miserable.

The biggest concern has been around the game‚Äôs worst players glitching through walls or using ziplines to get out of the map in places, sometimes making them impervious to damage while being able to take down other players.

This patch addresses some of those issues.

ARC Raiders Patch Notes ‚Äì December 11

The latest ARC Raiders patch was summarized by Embark Studios on social media. It‚Äôs a small change, but one that might prove to be quite mighty:

Time to restart your client, there‚Äôs a new update rolling out!

  • Removed zipline out-of-bounds exploit on Stella Montis
  • Fixed vaulting bug on Blue Gate
  • Corrected material issues affecting bullet/blocking & ARC vision
  • Closed gap in Spaceport Launch Tower wall.

Patch Cadence Update:

Going forward, updates and store rotations will move to Tuesdays, and will not be on a weekly cadence. With the holidays approaching, the team are taking a much needed break to rest and recover, returning in January with more exciting updates.

We‚Äôll continue to monitor and work on critical issues during this time, but for now‚Ä¶

Get ready for the Cold Snap update next Tuesday, packed with fixes and new content!

Fans were quick to comment about the other outstanding issues under the post, such as the broken Trophies on PlayStation 5, which are preventing some users from hitting 100% completion of the game. In a title where a completionist attitude is front and centre, this is understandably quite irritating.

Have you been hit by anyone using a map exploit in ARC Raiders? Let us know if you‚Äôre happy to see this change going in on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Nintendo Shares Drop $14bn Amid Chip Shortages
item.content:encoded:
A significant drop in Nintendo‚Äôs share price on Wednesday wiped billions from the company‚Äôs value, amid growing concern over the surging price of components and memory chips.

Nintendo‚Äôs share value dropped as much as 4.7 per cent on December 10, with the surging prices and shortages of key components, including memory chips, playing a major role.

Bloomberg reports the drop in Nintendo‚Äôs share prices is the biggest since May, citing market intelligence firm TrendForce in stating that the price Nintendo has to pay for 12 GB RAM in the Switch 2 has jumped 41 per cent.

In December, Nintendo‚Äôs shares have declined in seven of eight trading days, wiping around $14bn of value from the company, and the concern is that it could get worse.

While the Switch 2 has enjoyed an extremely popular launch period, aided by the releases of the likes of Mario Kart: World, the component situation in the market is becoming extremely problematic for Nintendo and other developers.

Nintendo may be forced to adjust prices for the Switch 2 console, with Dell and HP among those to have already warned that price rises could be on the cards in 2026.

With the large storage sizes of some of the biggest games, many players have sought to purchase additional storage for their devices, but the prices of those add-ons are already increasing.

In a market that is extremely sensitive to price increases, as shown by the backlash earlier this year to increases to an Xbox Game Pass subscription, it creates a worrying period for Nintendo and other console-building companies.

Do you think 2026 will see major price increases for devices, including Nintendo Switch 2? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

item.title: Elon Musk Wants One Major ARC Raiders Change to Happen
item.content:encoded:
That‚Äôs not a title you likely thought you‚Äôd read today, but it‚Äôs true. In a post on social media under a recent Embark Studios message, Elon Musk suggested a major change that could alter the core combat mechanics in ARC Raiders, the electrifying extraction adventure title released on October 30.

Elon Musk is a well-documented gamer who has participated in live streams on his X platform, but earlier this year, he openly admitted to ‚Äòcheating‚Äô in games like Diablo and Path of Exile.

What does Elon Musk want to change in ARC Raiders?

Elon Wants to Hunt People

In his post on social media, Elon Musk, the eccentric entrepreneur and super-billionaire, wrote:

Good game.

A way to hunt players who have betrayed you would be üî•üî•

This gels with the recent arrival of a satirical ‚ÄòSperanza Watchlist‚Äô that players could use to identify griefers and other abusive players in ARC Raiders. It was powered entirely by fake data, but it was humorous enough to get fans interested for a while about the concept of naming and shaming some of ARC Raiders‚Äô more troublesome users.

Elon‚Äôs comment landed under a post from Embark Studios requesting feedback from the community regarding the ARC Raiders map pool. Of the five maps released thus far, a diverse array of opportunities is presented, but the environments available aren‚Äôt without their fair share of issues.

Most notably, fans of the extraction adventure are still complaining about the exploits that allow players to phase through walls on certain maps.

In the past, Elon Musk has spoken about Elden Ring, Mass Effect, Diablo IV, Civilization, and BioShock, amongst others. He‚Äôs a self-professed ‚Äòliving god of video games‚Äô and has boasted about being a ‚Äòtop Quake player‚Äô in his youth, carrying on his love for gaming as an adult and one of the richest people on Earth.

Are you surprised that Elon Musk is a fan of a game where an AI-driven robotic race oppresses humans everywhere? Let us know what you think about this story on the Insider Gaming Discord server.
